NamedNodeMap.summary: The NamedNodeMap interface represents a collection of objects. Objects inside a NamedNodeMap are not in any particular order, unlike , although they may be accessed by an index as in an array.

remarks.para: A NamedNodeMap object is live and will thus be auto-updated if changes are made to its contents internally or elsewhere.

blockquote.para: Note: Although called NamedNodeMap, this interface doesn't deal with objects but with objects, which are a specialized class of objects.
